Class Point2D

java.lang.Object
util.math.Point2D
Direct Known Subclasses:
Point3D
public class Point2D extends Object
Point2D represents a point in 2D space with x and y coordinates.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected double
    x
    The x-coordinate of the point.
    protected double
    y
    The y-coordinate of the point.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Point2D(double[] point)
    Constructs a Point2D from an array of two doubles.
    Point2D(double x, double y)
    Constructs a Point2D with the specified x and y coordinates.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    double
    distance(Point2D other)
    Calculates the Euclidean distance between this point and another point.
    boolean
    equals(Object obj)
    Checks if this point is equal to another object.
    double
    getX()
    Returns the x-coordinate of the point.
    double
    getY()
    Returns the y-coordinate of the point.
    double
    magnitude()
    Returns the magnitude (length) of the vector from the origin to this point.
    Point2D
    normalize()
    Returns a normalized (unit length) version of this point as a vector.

    Returns a new Point2D that is the result of scaling this point by a factor.
    Point2D

    Returns a new Point2D that is the result of subtracting another point from this point.

  • Constructor Details

    • Point2D

      public Point2D(double[] point)
      Constructs a Point2D from an array of two doubles.
      Parameters:
      point - an array where point[0] is x and point[1] is y

    • Point2D

      public Point2D(double x, double y)
      Constructs a Point2D with the specified x and y coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate
      y - the y-coordinate

  • Method Details

    • getX

      public double getX()
      Returns the x-coordinate of the point.
      Returns:
      the x-coordinate

    • getY

      public double getY()
      Returns the y-coordinate of the point.
      Returns:
      the y-coordinate

    • distance

      public double distance(Point2D other)
      Calculates the Euclidean distance between this point and another point.
      Parameters:
      other - the other point
      Returns:
      the distance between the two points

    • subtract

      public Point2D subtract(Point2D other)
      Returns a new Point2D that is the result of subtracting another point from this point.
      Parameters:
      other - the point to subtract
      Returns:
      the resulting Point2D

    • scale

      public Point2D scale(double factor)
      Returns a new Point2D that is the result of scaling this point by a factor.
      Parameters:
      factor - the scale factor
      Returns:
      the resulting Point2D

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Checks if this point is equal to another object.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to compare
      Returns:
      true if the object is a Point2D with the same coordinates, false otherwise

    • magnitude

      public double magnitude()
      Returns the magnitude (length) of the vector from the origin to this point.
      Returns:
      the magnitude of the point

    • normalize

      public Point2D normalize()
      Returns a normalized (unit length) version of this point as a vector.
      Returns:
      the normalized Point2D, or (0,0) if the point is at the origin
